title: Dittofeed
author: Chandler Craig
excerpt: Dittofeed is the first developer-focused, open-source alternative to platforms like Klaviyo, Iterable, and Customer.io. Automate transactional and marketing messages to users across email, SMS, mobile push, WhatsApp, Slack, and more.
